DataElement.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Limited by Health Recreation 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of their health limitations as related to recreation in the past seven days, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Limited by Health Recreation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients._A question about a person's most important health issues._The most recent week, including today._An indication that a person's activities are limited by their health condition._Any activity that is intended for refreshment or diversion.

ObjectClass.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Concepts.longName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Property.preferredName: Most Important Issue Past Week Limited by Health Recreation
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about a person's most important health issues.:The most recent week, including today.:An indication that a person's activities are limited by their health condition.:Any activity that is intended for refreshment or diversion.

Concepts.definition: A question about a person's most important health issues.
The most recent week. May include the present day.
An indication that a person's activities are limited by their health condition.
Any activity that is intended for refreshment or diversion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: UWQoLv4:University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Rogers S.N., and Lowe D., Version 4, 1999
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NRG study in Rave per request by V.Patel. mc 5/16/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard of five responses from no recreation limitations to can't do anything enjoyable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual can't do anything enjoyable.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual can't do anything enjoyable.

PermissibleValues.value: There are severe limitations to what I can do, mostly I stay at home and watch TV.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Severe Limitations, Mostly Stay Home and Watch Television

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Severe Limitations, Mostly Stay Home and Watch Television
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has severe limitations to what they can do and mostly stays at home watching TV.

Concepts.longName: Severe Limitations, Mostly Stay Home and Watch Television
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has severe limitations to what they can do and mostly stays at home watching TV.

PermissibleValues.value: There are many times when I wish I could get out more, but I'm not up to it.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Many Times Wish to Go Out More But Not Up to It

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Many Times Wish to Go Out More But Not Up to It
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual wishes to get out more, but is not up to it.

Concepts.longName: Many Times Wish to Go Out More But Not Up to It
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual wishes to get out more, but is not up to it.

PermissibleValues.value: There are a few things I can't do but I still get out and enjoy life.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Few Limitations But Still Go Out and Enjoy Life

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Few Limitations But Still Go Out and Enjoy Life
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has a few things they cannot do, but they still get out and enjoy life

Concepts.longName: Few Limitations But Still Go Out and Enjoy Life
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has a few things they cannot do, but they still get out and enjoy life.

PermissibleValues.value: There are no limitations to recreation at home or away from home.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: No Limitations to Recreation at Home or Away

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No Limitations to Recreation at Home or Away
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is not limited in their recreation at home or away.

Concepts.longName: No Limitations to Recreation at Home or Away
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is not limited in their recreation at home or away.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for NRG study in Rave per request by V.Patel. mc 5/16/14
